A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I originally gave this two stars\, but upon seeing it again\, the jokes fall flat and nothing keeps this story afloat. It’s one big\, bloated Twinkie — seems to offer sustenance to the hungry fan\, but ultimately only has a short burst of energy followed by a crashing let down. I can’t believe they gave this director the keys to the next generation. If you call yourself a true Star Wars fan and love this movie\, you have never understood good story writing. Perhaps it’s time to admit you’re just in love with the idea of watching action figures being moved around on a screen for 2.5 hours
